Sakura jumps into the air and uses all her [[chakra]] to [[Chakra Enhanced Strength|manifest]] a gigantic fist. As she then propels herself back to the ground, Sakura uses all her might to smash her fist into the opponent.

[[pl:Ōka Ryōranshō]]
